questions.question: A completely ordinary Tuesday morning—how likely are you to feel genuinely happy for no big reason?
Your favorite silly song comes on the radio while you’re alone in the car. You:
choices: Turn it up and sing/dance like nobody’s watching

questions.question: When something wonderful happens to a friend, your first feeling is:
choices: Pure excitement—like it happened to you

questions.question: How often do you laugh out loud when you’re completely by yourself?
You spot a beautiful sunset. You immediately:
choices: Stop everything to soak it in and maybe take a photo to share
Notice it and feel a little lift

questions.question: People would most likely describe your energy in a room as:
When life is stressful, you still manage to find or create small moments of joy:
You’re walking past strangers and accidentally make eye contact. You usually:
How easy is it for you to turn a bad day around with something as simple as good music, a treat, or a funny video?
choices: Super easy—I do it all the time

questions.question: At your core, you believe life is:
choices: A gift meant to be enjoyed
A mix of ups and downs

score.high: Radiant Joyful Spirit  You carry happiness like it’s contagious (and it is). The world is brighter because you’re in it.
score.medium: Warm-Hearted & Happy  You’ve got plenty of joy—you just sometimes forget to turn the volume all the way up.
score.low: Joy Seeker in Training  You’re capable of deep happiness, but life might have dimmed your light for now. It’s still there—time to let it shine!
